General.Name: Origin Materials Inc
General.Description: Origin Materials, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a carbon-negative materials company. The company develops proprietary platform technology to convert biomass or plant-based carbon into building block chemicals chloromethylfurfural and hydrothermal carbon, as well as other product intermediates. Origin Materials, Inc. is headquartered in West Sacramento, California.
General.Address: 930 Riverside Parkway, West Sacramento, CA, United States, 95605
